Body: Possible Duplicate:  Connecting to VPN forces having secure screen lock  I have Sony Xperia S with ICS 4.0.4 stock rom (rooted), I need to have a VPN account set in my phone, but when I add a VPN account, the phone asks me to set either a pattern or password for lock screen, which I don't want.Is there an app or hack to disable lock screen or at least, have just simple "slide to unclock" instead of pattern or password?
